titleStmt.title: All the transactions between the noblemen and gentlemen now in arms for the covenant, and the officers and soldiers now in arms by authority of the Parliament of the kingdom of Scotland. Together with several orders made by the Committee of Estates in that kingdom, against all that have acted in the late unlawful engagement against the kingdom of England. Signed by command of the commissioners for the treaty, Mr. Tho: Henderson.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: ... reprinted at London by John Field,

notesStmt.note: Reprint. Originally published: Edinburgh : printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
